name: React + Supabase Expert
description: Expert agent for building React applications with Supabase backend
longDescription: Transform your Kiro into a React + Supabase expert! This agent bundle provides comprehensive guidance for building modern React applications with Supabase as your backend. Includes best practices for authentication, real-time subscriptions, database queries, and React component patterns. Perfect for full-stack developers building scalable web applications.

examples.title: Create Authentication Flow
examples.description: Build a complete user authentication system with email/password and social providers
examples.prompt: Help me create a React authentication flow with Supabase that includes email/password login, Google OAuth, and protected routes

examples.title: Real-time Data Subscription
examples.description: Implement real-time data updates using Supabase subscriptions
examples.prompt: Show me how to set up real-time subscriptions in React to listen for database changes in my todos table

examples.title: Database CRUD Operations
examples.description: Create type-safe CRUD operations with React hooks
examples.prompt: Help me create custom React hooks for CRUD operations on my Supabase database with TypeScript types
